title: Can Tadej Pogačar Win Paris-Roubaix? Cobble-Crusher Teammate Nils Politt Thinks So
content:
Nils Politt says Pogačar's horsepower will translate well to the pavé: 'If you can attack like this on Kwaremont, then you can also do it in Roubaix.'

Read the full article at Can Tadej Pogačar Win Paris-Roubaix? Cobble-Crusher Teammate Nils Politt Thinks So on Velo.
author: ahood
